summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 2, California Heights Addition and Block 2, Seaview Heights Addition, being the alley between 41st Avenue Southwest and 42nd Avenue Southwest from West Hudson Street to West Dawson Street; and certain other streets, alleys and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 15598 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
